alert.note: Alert for Osceola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Osceola County through 345 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reed City, or 8 miles west of Evart, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and minor flooding from torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Evart... Reed City... Hersey... Sears... Avondale... Nartron Field... Ashton... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
